message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and high-quality standards, I estimate its value to be far beyond its face value of $12000. Considering its exceptional benefits and the time and resources invested into its development, I kindly propose an offer of $15000 for this product. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the potential return on investment it can bring to you. I look forward to discussing how this product can meet your specific needs and contribute to your success. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our offer.
